content.raw:
The model now resides in directory [testing](https://github.com/SietseAchterop/Rowing/tree/master/testing) in my github page. Please see the xacro-file, and a short video from gazebo.

I now really made the model as simple as possible, with 3 revolute joints, and it still  crashes.
E.g. the torso of the rower  now consists of two links with a fixed joint. If I make the torso out of only one link then there is no crashing.
content.html:
The model now resides in directory testing in my github page. Please see the xacro-file, and a short video from gazebo.

I now really made the model as simple as possible, with 3 revolute joints, and it still crashes. E.g. the torso of the rower now consists of two links with a fixed joint. If I make the torso out of only one link then there is no crashing.
